abstract: The Philharmonic will perform across New York City this summer in June, marking the 50th anniversary of its free series of park concerts.

headline.main: New York Philharmonic to Celebrate 50 Years of Concerts in the Parks
headline.print_headline: Philharmonic Schedules Concerts in the Parks

snippet: The Philharmonic will perform across New York City this summer in June, marking the 50th anniversary of its free series of park concerts.
